original_text: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.
korean_text: 이는 남편이 아내의 머리 됨이 그리스도께서 교회의 머리 됨과 같음이니 그가 바로 몸의 구주시니라

sentences.original_text: For the husband is the head of the wife
even as Christ is the head of the church
and he is the saviour of the body
